posts.post_content:

Mac

Hi Mac :-)

Good luck with the set. It seems like every time I pay a bunch for one of the tougher pins in this set, one pops up on ebay a month later for a song. There is a very nice Bransfield on ebay in case you haven't spotted it.
tbob
